title: Make colors for on and off state button configurable

body:
Hej Matthias,

I tried your Google Now integration and recognized that only one worded devices names works.
Because I have more than twenty devices the most of them have two worded device names.
Would be great, if you can fix this.
Another thing - but want to avoid to open another issue - can you also add voice commands for shutters? So it's possible to say something like "Open shutter bedroom" or "Öffne Rollo Schlafzimmer".

Thx a lot! :-)
title: "Ok, Google" problem with devices with more than one word

body:
After starting the app a switch to the configuration (wrench icon) does nothing but freeze the app. A black screen follows. Only canceling the app is helpful.
This situation is reproducible.
title: Switch to "configuration" let andFHEM freeze
Show all attributes of generic devices / move non-generic devices to generic devices

body:
Hej Matthias,

if the details view from a single device is shown and I press the update button, then it should only be updated for the current device instead of the whole setup.
title: Update device behavior

body:
Hej Matthias,

would it be possible to have a little more comfort in the direct input of commands?
*) If it is found in the list, then it is not applied a second time, but only listed in the first place of the row
*) Possibility to edit or delete already known commands.

Thx a lot!
title: Changing history behavior for 'command sending'

body:
Hej Matthias,

could you extend the state behavior of the shutters?
Exactly it's about the slider:
So that the state 'open' and also 'opened' is used to show 0 percent while 'close' and also 'closed' is used to show 100 percent.

Thx a lot! :-)
title: Extension of the shutter states

title: Support httpmod
Event map configuration (only for andFHEM, as hook)

body: Like "volume" instead of volume "99". A dialog should appear allowing to select the rest of the state.
title: TargetState widget : allow selection of "incomplete" states
Require PIN for specific device actions

body:
Es wäre toll, wenn die Schaltfläche der einzelnen Widget-Knöpfe größer und nicht nur der Text wie 'on/off' oder 'open/close' als Schalter fungiert..
Vorallem bei kleineren Displays kommt es öfters vor, dass sich andFHEM öffnet anstatt die Schaltung durchzuführen.
Am besten wäre es, wenn das ganze Widget als Knopf fungieren könnte oder zumindest noch der Name (bzw. der Alias) Teil des Schaltbereichs wären.

Thx a lot!
title: Größere Widget Schaltflächen
Mark old attribute values (i.e. after 15min) as old (i.e. red font color)
Appwidget showing a timer desc and linking to the timer edit page
Merge CUL_HM channel devices into master device

body:
User comment:
Placing of the refresh time depends a bit on which time. Could you put the time it was received from the server on the toolbar, next to the button? For a specific device, you could put it in the detail view title bar for example  "general details (refreshed @ 10:00)". The eBay app has a nice way of doing this with offsets; "general details (refreshed  9s ago)"
title: Show time since last update somewhere
Hide "unimportant" device attributes in detail (show after button click ?)

body: Zum Beispiel, Montag, Dienstag, Mittwoch, alle 5 Wochen, für acht Stunden einschalten.
title: At Erweiterung
Switch more than one device in timers
Create notifys from within the app

body:
```xml
<STATE key="actuator" value="0%" measured="2012-08-02 18:08:14"/>
<STATE key="actuator1" value="offset: 50" measured="2012-03-11 16:16:36"/>
<STATE key="actuator2" value="offset: -50" measured="2012-03-11 16:02:53"/>
```
title: Show multiple FHT actors state
